entry.title: Inbox Dump – Week of June 5
entry.summary: Welcome to Inbox Dump where we include the updates and announcements that flood our DMs each week and didn’t make it to The Defiant’s content platforms. Sometimes announcements here didn’t meet the bar to become a news story, sometimes they may have slipped through the cracks, or they came late and we haven’t had a chance to cover. At The … Inbox Dump – Week of June 5 Read More »

entry.title: Andreesen Horowitz Keeps Buying Web3 and Crypto
entry.summary: It’s a bear market and investors are picky. As many leave the space one institute has been spending nonetheless. In this video we’re taking a look into the projects a16z has been investing into.

entry.title: Global Markets Dive After Data Shows US Inflation Hit 8.6% in May
entry.summary: Crypto markets plunged Friday morning after the release of data showing U.S inflation accelerated in May to a 41-year high.

entry.title: BREAKING: Optimism Exploiter Returns 90% Of Stolen Tokens
entry.summary: 18M OP stolen OP tokens have been returned.
